name: Street Racer (itch)
description:
This is a project made for academics purpose, including two games based on Street Racer.

Controls: use left/right arrow key to control the car on the right and A/D to control the car on the left.

Part of the project is a remastered version of Street Racer, where the idea was to recreate the game as similar as possible to the original.

The other part is a remake based on the original game. The challenge here was making changes in the gameplay. So, I added some power-ups, in order to make the game more exciting and to enable one player to interfere in the other's race.
